articles.title: Film Show Held to Mark National Day of Kuwait
articles.content:
Film Show Held to Mark National Day of Kuwait 
    Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A film show was held here on Feb.26 on the occasion of the 43rd national day of Kuwait.
 Present there were Jon Hyon Chan, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and working people in the city.    
 The participants saw a Kuwaiti documentary film.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Zimbabwean President 
    Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, hoped that the reunification of the Korean peninsula would be realized in accordance with the proposal of the DPRK and voiced support for the DPRK's stand on the nuclear issue.
 When receiving credentials from Pak Kun Gwang, new DPRK ambassador e.p. to Zimbabwe, on February 19 the president said he was much pleased to see the fact that the DPRK values the relations with Zimbabwe and stressed the need to boost the bilateral cooperative relations.    
 He added that he has been grateful to President Kim Il Sung for unsparingly giving much aid to the Zimbabwean people during their struggle for independence and after the independence of the country and does not forget it.

Statement Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Birthday
articles.content:
Statement Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Birthday 
    Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A joint statement entitled "Long live Comrade Kim Jong Il, the sun of humankind! Congratulations on happy holiday celebrated under the banner of independence and Juche" was jointly issued on Jan. 31 on the occasion of the February holiday by the Arab Council for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Idea and Independence, the Arab Committee for Solidarity with the Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea and the Arab Solidarity Committee for Supporting the Struggle of the "National Democratic Front of South Korea" and the South Korean People, the Kim Jong Il Club of the Listeners and Friends of Pyongyang Broadcasts, the Arab Christians' Committee for Peace and the Arab Branch of the International Anti-Zionism Front.
 The statement praised Kim Jong Il as a great symbol of internationalism as he shows love for the people on this planet and instills into them energy to struggle and a personifier of the unanimous desire of all people to see a staunch leader who braves any difficulties.

Russian Ensemble Here
articles.content:
Russian Ensemble Here
    Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The State Academy Ensemble of the Ministry of Interior of Russia led by Viktor Eliseyev, head of the ensemble, arrived here today.
 It was greeted at the airport by Ji Jae Ryong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and Oleg Dabydov, charge d' affaires ad interim, and officials of the Russian embassy here.
